content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is James Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello James Smith, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. Let's start with a price of €500 per month. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of €500 per month.
Thank you for your time, Mister Heine. I will sign the lease agreement as soon as possible.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you, James Smith. I'm glad we were able to come to an agreement. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns before signing the lease agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I have no questions or concerns. I will sign the lease agreement as soon as possible.
Thank you again for your time, Mister Heine. I appreciate it.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: You're welcome, James Smith. Thank you for choosing to rent the apartment from me. I look forward to having you as a tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
